Keywords: Cosmic , Detective , Green Lantern Corps , Herald , Police , Politician
Real Name: Jo Mullein
Special Powers
ONE YEAR, AND A RING LIKE NO OTHER: When Jo Mullein uses Willpower and succeeds on a roll of 6, heal her 1 click.
INVESTIGATING THE FAR SECTOR: Charge, Flurry, Plasticity.
YOU JUST STARTED A NERD FIGHT: STOP, Invincible. // Jo Mullein has Colossal damage symbol.
